headline: AppLovin Corporation (APP): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on AppLovin Corporation on Elliot’s Musings’ Substack by Elliot. In this article, we will summarize the bull’s thesis on APP. AppLovin Corporation’s share was trading at $324.70 as of June 20th. APP’s trailing and forward P/E were 58.72 and 54.35 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. AppLovin (APP) has staged a historic […]
